column4: very special need: how to make a video of a peakmeter (audio visualizer-plugin) of an audio file?
dunno about making one, but you can find a few .. audacious has a plugin for it, ffplay does it by default, etc.
must be exactly from a special audio file. any way to use the visualizer-plugins of any audio player for any generator?
I'm not following you, and I'm not really audio-savvy either
